description: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) has a requirement for a Contractor with demonstrated expertise in Quality Assurance to provide services at OSFI.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Call for Proposals

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) invites Proposers to submit a proposal for Quality Assurance/Testing Professional Services.

### Solicitation Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-432-99841289
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 20232470
* **Publication Date**: March 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: Tuesday, March 26, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

### Tender Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026
* **Services Offered**: Quality Assurance and Testing Professional Services
* **Sector**: Information Technology Service Delivery
* **Contract Duration**: 27 months

### Evaluation and Selection Criteria

The Proposers will be evaluated based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Tendering Methods

This is a competitive procurement process that requires Selective Tendering.

### Notice URL/Attachments

The tender notice and attachments are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33789/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33789/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp_en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33789/avis-de-projet-de-marche-%28apm_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33789/avis-de-projet-de-marche-%28apm_fr.pdf).

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or further information, please contact:

**Aleksandra Green**
Contracting Officer
613-293-5842 | contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca
255 Albert Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0H2

This notice has been issued on the procurement opportunities website, [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). Respondents are to submit their proposals in accordance with the procurement processes and procedures specified in this notice. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their proposals conform to all requirements and to the date, time,
